app.error.message.404:
Oh no! The page you are looking for doesn't exist or
has been removed. Maybe a ghost took it — try going back home.
app.error.message.500:
Oops — something went wrong. Try refreshing this page later or
feel free to contact me if the problem persists.
app.error.message.503:
This page is under maintenance. Try refreshing this page later or
feel free to contact me if the problem persists.
app.error.title: {code} - {type}
app.footer.new_version_available: A new version is available! Reload the page :)
app.main_hero.headline: Hi, I'm {firstName}.
This page is a work in progress. Check back soon for something cool!
